channel.title: Comments on: Dot Circle – An Introduction to Vectors
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Jessica
item.dc:creator: Jessica
item.description: I love this! "The best description was one that could not be misinterpreted." Brilliant! I love seeing the use, impact, and effectiveness of the feedback! Bravo, Evan! Keep up the great work!
item.content:encoded: I love this! “The best description was one that could not be misinterpreted.” Brilliant! I love seeing the use, impact, and effectiveness of the feedback! Bravo, Evan! Keep up the great work!
